(I) Habitat change: watch water quality . from new subdivisions in Cinnibar valley above Troften Park.
(K) Additional comments: Electroshocking above highway on southeast fork shows numerous fry, one jack and two redds. Excellent rearing area- groundwater ponding. Richard Baily conducting pole counts with Malaspina Col.
